title: Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform from AWS Marketplace Guide
subtitle: Install and configure Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform from AWS Marketplace
abstract: {PlatformNameShort} helps teams manage complex multi-tier deployments by adding control, knowledge, and delegation to Ansible-powered environments. This guide helps you to understand the installation and use of Ansible Automation Platform from AWS Marketplace. This document has been updated to include information for the latest release of Ansible Automation Platform on AWS Marketplace.
